title: Which most intrinsically motivated to write

content.question: Which of the following individuals would be most intrinsically motivated to write?

choices.label: Greg, who will keep his job as an editor only if he publishes a top-selling book every month
Carlota, who wants to publish enough books to buy her dream home
Savitri, who has several interesting stories that she wants to write
Ray, who was offered $5,000,000 to write a sequel to his first book, which was a top seller

content.answer: Savitri, who has several interesting stories that she wants to write

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
